name: Hide Facebook shared links
description:
Hide "So-and-so shared a link" stories from the Facebook home feed.
Also hides "People also shared" popup which appears when you click on one.
additional_info:
Experimental. No guarantees that it will work. Also high chance of breaking when Facebook updates

If you prefer to just fade out and condense them instead:
https://userstyles.org/styles/122457/fade-out-facebook-shared-links
